original_title: Police raid unregistered Drug Rehab Center in Dehiwala
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Two suspects who operated an unregistered rehabilitation center on Malwatta Road in Dehiwala have been apprehended following a raid conducted by the Dehiwala police station.
Acting on a tip-off, the authorities took action against the illegal center, which was not registered with the National Dangerous Drugs Control Board.

During the raid, a total of 34 drug users who were undergoing rehabilitation at the facility were taken into police custody. These individuals were aged between 50 and 51 years and were residents of Dehiwala and Borella areas. The arrested suspects will be presented before the Mt. Lavinia Magistrate's Court for onward legal proceedings.
